OrgName: Corporate HindSight, LLC (sold to HiMark Software)
activities: Corporate HindSight oversees auditing functions for its Fortune 1000 clients in the corporate travel industry throughout the world including EU countries.  Corporate Hind$ight enters into contracts with its corporate customers whereby it acts as their agent for audits and the use of any data revealed during the audit process is governed by the written contracts and data is not used by Corporate Hind$ight for any purpose not specified in the contracts.
eucountries: Cyprus, Czech Republic, Estonia, Hungary, Latvia, Lithuania, Malta, Poland, Slovakia, Slovenia, United Kingdom
industrysector: General Services - (GSV)Management Consulting Services - (MCS)Travel & Tourism Services - (TRA)
privacyprograms: None.  Use of protected data is governed exclusively by Corporate Hind$ight contracts with corporate customers who supply or arrange for access to the data.
